title: Language Filter in-game Wont Turn Off After a Reinstall
body:
The other day I had to reinstall my client, and ever since then my in-game chat has been censored. Turning off the language filter in the client has no effect, and I haven't found an option in the in-game menu to change it either. There was an old, archived thread that had a fix that looked like this;
"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences

Open up the shared(character name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad

It should say:

[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1

Set the number to 0"

but when I went through the file path detailed there, there was no lol_air_client folder. Are there any other ways to fix this?

replies.body:
Ah, this issue is quite annoying! I've seen it a few times recently here on H&S. Most players reported this was resolved if they turned the chat filter off, immediately closed out of the client, then logged back in.

Let me know if this happened to work for you.
I'll give that a go! Thanks for the quick response, and my apologies for the delayed reply.
